extendedInfo.description: This is the free version of "Team Volleyball Stats." In this version you may only track statistics of a single player but they can be kept for an entire season of up to 5 game matches. Stats can then be exported in an email with an attached Excel file ready to be viewed.-Follow us on Twitter @Arrowsharkprods and when we reach 100 followers, Team Volleyball Stats will go FREE for a limited time.-Stats can be viewed per game or as a season total.-Track service aces, service attempts, service errors, set assists, set attempts, set errors, attacking kills, attacking attempts, attacking errors, digs, solo blocks, assist blocks, blocking errors, ball handling errors, and serve receive on a scale from 0 (error) to 3 (perfect). Along with these are 4 customizable buttons which can be changed at will. -See the instructional video at http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gnMKgkSrFuI for detailed instructions. The link will send you to a video for the Team version of the app which is identical except that multiple players may be tracked.-Visit our website at http://arrowsharkprods.weebly.com/-Follow us on Twitter @Arrowsharkprods-Like Arrowshark on Facebook!http://www.facebook.com/Arrowshark-Please report any force closed errors so that they may be fixed.

reviews.title: Good...but
reviews.comment: Using Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 and screen won\'t rotate? Seriously? The interface is good but agree with the other person using colors for the different stats categories. Red for serving, green for passing, etc. Would like ability to name the \"Custom\" buttons.
reviews.author: Brad Curtis

reviews.title: Very Effective
reviews.comment: Does a good job tracking one person. Easy to set up. Would be nice if the points advanced automatically when you register a point for you person.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app!!!
reviews.comment: Keeps track of individuals volleyball stats very good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Pretty ready to use but difficult to keep up with stat input.
reviews.author: Doug Adams

reviews.title: IVS
reviews.comment: Its great, all it need is a forfeit option. Other than that it\'s good ..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome and incredibly easy to use!
reviews.author: A Google User
